channel.title: There and back
channel.description: Recent content on There and back

item.title: One Boy by Deborah Green
item.description: Published by Every Day Press After her husband died when their son was two, Deborah Green sometimes wrote down on random scraps of paper their boy’s words. These notes are the basis of the book, in which one can hear a young child’s voice after incomprehensible loss - and see his growth and affirmation. ISBN 978-0-9779258-0-3 $18.00 US
